item.title: 3. Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
item.description: Given a stringÂ s, find the length of theÂ longestÂ substring without repeating characters. Example 1: Input: s = “abcabcbb” Output: 3 Explanation: The answer is “abc”, with the length of 3.

item.description: Given two sorted arraysÂ nums1Â andÂ nums2Â of sizeÂ mÂ andÂ nÂ respectively, returnÂ the medianÂ of the two sorted arrays.
